data.name: Iron
data.description: Iron is a ferrous metal commonly used in construction and manufacturing. It is known for its strength and magnetic properties.

data.name: Copper
data.description: Copper is a ductile metal with excellent electrical conductivity. It is widely used in electrical wiring, plumbing, and various industrial applications.

data.name: Aluminum
data.description: Aluminum is a lightweight and corrosion-resistant metal. It is used in the production of aircraft, packaging materials, and construction.

data.name: Gold
data.description: Gold is a precious metal valued for its rarity, beauty, and malleability. It has been used for currency, jewelry, and various cultural artifacts throughout history.

data.name: Silver
data.description: Silver is a versatile metal with high thermal and electrical conductivity. It is used in jewelry, electronics, and various industrial applications.
